title: Brazil to start production of AstraZeneca vaccine by January, says biomedical center
author: Reuters Staff
description: Brazil's biomedical center Fiocruz expects to start producing the AstraZeneca vaccine against COVID-19 in December or January, its production vice-president Marco Krieger said in a TV interview on Monday.
cleaned_text: Fiocruz expects to start producing the AstraZeneca vaccine against COVID-19 in December or January, its production vice-president Marco Krieger said in a TV interview on Monday. He added Fiocruz, in Rio de Janeiro, hopes to deliver the first doses by March. Reporting by Maria Carolina Marcello in Brasilia; editing by Stephen Eisenhammer
